scenes.description: Ina showcases the Takodachi Ramen Stopper merchandise and mentions it's part of a HoloMyth 3D collab.
Ina excitedly announces her holographic debut occurring later that day.
Ina gives her closing remarks, thanking the audience and promoting upcoming 3D showcases for the rest of HoloMyth.
Transition screen followed by a fake error message and glitch effect.
A short comic strip featuring Ina and a Takodachi about the 'end' of the showcase.
Final title card for the showcase.

subtitles.original: And that's not all. It's HoloMyth 3D collab.
subtitles.english: And that's not all. It's HoloMyth 3D collab.

subtitles.original: So after that, after everyone's is over,
subtitles.english: So after that, after everyone's is over,

subtitles.original: it's gonna be on sale, so please look forward to it.
subtitles.english: it's gonna be on sale, so please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: I hope you guys like it. Oh, it's so cute!
subtitles.english: I hope you guys like it. Oh, it's so cute!

subtitles.original: But yeah, one more thing, one more thing, one more thing.
subtitles.english: But yeah, one more thing, one more thing, one more thing.

subtitles.original: It is actually tonight.
subtitles.english: It is actually tonight.

subtitles.original: Tonight!
subtitles.english: Tonight!

subtitles.original: Around what, five hours or so from now,
subtitles.english: Around what, five hours or so from now,

subtitles.original: it's gonna be my real holographic debut! Woo!
subtitles.english: it's gonna be my real holographic debut! Woo!

subtitles.original: I'm gonna be on hologram! Eeee!
subtitles.english: I'm gonna be on hologram! Eeee!

subtitles.original: Yeah, apparently there's gonna be a lot of tentacles,
subtitles.english: Yeah, apparently there's gonna be a lot of tentacles,

subtitles.original: so I hope you guys look forward to it. Yes.
subtitles.english: so I hope you guys look forward to it. Yes.

subtitles.original: Ah, it's been... it's been an amazing time, everyone.
subtitles.english: Ah, it's been... it's been an amazing time, everyone.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much again.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much again.

subtitles.original: And make sure you check out everyone in Myth's 3D showcases too.
subtitles.english: And make sure you check out everyone in Myth's 3D showcases too.

subtitles.original: Next up is Kiara. Kiara, that's you. That's you. Yeah.
subtitles.english: Next up is Kiara. Kiara, that's you. That's you. Yeah.

subtitles.original: But yes, and then it's gonna be Calli, and then Gura,
subtitles.english: But yes, and then it's gonna be Calli, and then Gura,

subtitles.original: and then Ame, and then the collab. That's right.
subtitles.english: and then Ame, and then the collab. That's right.

subtitles.original: It's gonna be such a fun month! Eeee!
subtitles.english: It's gonna be such a fun month! Eeee!

subtitles.original: Anyways, thank you so much again everyone
subtitles.english: Anyways, thank you so much again everyone

subtitles.original: for being patient and waiting.
subtitles.english: for being patient and waiting.

subtitles.original: It's finally here.
subtitles.english: It's finally here.

subtitles.original: And I'll continue to do my best. Yes.
subtitles.english: And I'll continue to do my best. Yes.

subtitles.original: Thank you! Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Thank you! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: This is it! Bye bye!
subtitles.english: This is it! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: A few more minutes until the 3D showcase is over.
subtitles.english: A few more minutes until the 3D showcase is over.

subtitles.original: So what happens when the 3D showcase is over?
subtitles.english: So what happens when the 3D showcase is over?

subtitles.original: You don't know?
subtitles.english: You don't know?

subtitles.original: That's when 3D showcase begins.
subtitles.english: That's when 3D showcase begins.
